This spellheart is fashioned from the tip of a demon's horn that's been polished until smooth and shiny. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 29.

  • Armor You gain resistance 5 to evil and chaotic.
  • Weapon After you cast an enchantment spell by Activating the horn, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional [[/r 1d8[mental]]] damage until end of your next turn.
